channel.title: Rens de Jong - BNR Nieuwsradio on Terence Dores Cruz - Postdoctoral Researcher

item.title: Werkverkenners: Roddelen op het werk
item.description: In this interview, featured on Dutch radio BNR and the Werkverkenners podcast, I talk about the positive and negative sides of gossip.
